value.title: Common Data Service for Analytics (CDS-A) and Power BI - an Introduction
value.excerpt: In this video, Matthew Roche joins Adam for a look at the Common Data Service for Analytics. This is an offering that will be coming out in public preview in the Summer of 2018 and will help you to bring together data sources into a common schema.  Business Application Platform: Power BI | Business Applications

value.title: Copy Conditional Columns in Power Query or Power BI
value.excerpt: In this video, Adam looks at how to use conditional columns within Power Query and then copying them for use in other queries or Power BI Desktop files. This is a great technique if you don't want to retype all of the conditional items in the dialog in Power BI.  LET'S CONNECT!  Guy in a Cube -- https://guyinacube.com

value.title: Easily get an access token for the Power BI Embedded Playground
value.excerpt: You need an Embed Token for the Power BI Embedded Playground, but you don't want to write code. Adam shows you how to easily get an access token with no code using PowerShell.  Power BI Embedded Playground - https://microsoft.github.io/PowerBI-JavaScript/demo/ Power BI REST API - https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/rest/api/power-bi/

value.excerpt: In this video, we look at the On-Premises Data Gateway. What is it exactly? This can be used with more than just Power BI. This includes PowerApps, Microsoft Flow, Azure Analysis Services and more. The entire Power Platform!   If you found this video helpful, we have a free cheat sheet for you for more

value.excerpt: Adam walks through how to navigate and use Power BI reports for consumers, or end users. This is geared towards someone not really familiar with the Power BI interface or how to use Power BI reports to their fullest.  ******** LET'S CONNECT! ********  -- http://twitter.com/guyinacube -- http://twitter.com/awsaxton
